page.title: 09INDUSTRY IN ROGERSTONE-2
page.content: Rhiwderin and Bassaleg are dormitory, commuter villages.Rhiwderin has no manufacturing jobs whilst Bassaleg offers 36 jobs in 3 factories making plastic components,wooden frames and electrical repairs.Rogerstone has 2 industrial estates-the Wern Industrial Estate opened in the 1950's with recent additions(has 10 factories employing 1,134),and the Rogerstone Industrial Estate(with 3 factories employing 602) opened in 1984. The newest estate produces crisps,computer microchips and distributes ladies underwear.The larger estate's oldest factories produce bread,cakes and canned meat-all benefitting from the good road network and nearby docks.The more recent factories produce aluminium ladders, furniture frames,savory pies and repairs books.
